summary:
Web3 Clouds Made Simple - First to Market Decentralized Storage Aggregator

 Major Partners and Integrations - 

 What We Do - ColdStack can help you take ownership of your data, reduce costs, and improve security by making it easy for anyone to access the Web3 cloud ecosystem regardless of your technological prowess

 ColdStack — the fastest way to store all your data in the cloud - Data storage privacy — all data is encrypted at the time of writing to storage
